HomePage.title: Free URL Shortener & Link Management Platform
HomePage.subtitle: The ultimate solution for shortening long URLs. Create short, memorable links with our powerful and easy-to-use platform. Perfect for social media, marketing campaigns, and more. Compares to services like Bitly, TinyURL, and Rebrandly.
HomePage.form_title: Enter a Long URL to Make a Short Link
HomePage.form_terms: I agree to the <terms>Terms of Service</terms>, <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>, and <cookies>Cookie Policy</cookies>
HomePage.marketing_promo_text: Join thousands of satisfied users who trust our platform for all their link management needs.

FeaturesSection.title: Why Our Platform Rocks
FeaturesSection.subtitle: Discover the powerful features that make our URL shortener the best choice for your links.
FeaturesSection.feature_1_text: Create short, memorable links that are easy to share. Use your own custom alias to brand your links and make them stand out.
FeaturesSection.feature_2_text: Gain valuable insights into your link performance with our detailed analytics. Track clicks, geographic location, referrers, and more.
FeaturesSection.feature_3_text: Our platform is built with security in mind. We provide reliable and fast redirects, ensuring your links are always accessible.
FeaturesSection.feature_4_text: Our URL shortener is free to use and incredibly easy to get started with. No account is required to shorten your first link.

Popups.cookie_message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to visit this site you agree to our use of cookies.

Errors.alias_min_length: Custom alias must be at least 5 characters long
